vulnerabilities.title: Finance.js vulnerable to DoS via the IRR function’s depth parameter
vulnerabilities.description: Finance.js v4.1.0 contains a Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability via the IRR function’s depth parameter. Improper handling of the recursion/iteration limit can lead to excessive CPU usage, causing application stalls or crashes.

vulnerabilities.title: Finance.js vulnerable to DoS via the seekZero() parameter
vulnerabilities.description: An issue in finance.js v.4.1.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the seekZero() parameter.
